timeline.bodyText:
I tried to get the height of the view from binding. But it always returns 0 for the first time. Anyone knows why?
The reason we have to add top margin is to fit the preferences layout under the toolbar. There is no standard practice around how to add a toolbar because official docs recommend using the PreferenceFragment within an Activity. In our case, the activity doesn't have a toolbar. Any guidelines or suggestions are most welcome!
